name: KITAL: The Weight Of Survival
description:
This is an entry for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam.

KITAL is the last of its kind - and it's up to you to prevent extinction.
The labs have sent people after you to retrieve the rare creature. You can't let that happen.

Short top-down puzzle adventure.

Arrow Keys / SPACE / Left Control to play.

Estimated playtime: ~15 Minutes.
